reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 449/00: DEADLINE FOR PREPARATION OF PRELIMINARY LIST - HAMILTON
reg_info.reg_name_text: DEADLINE FOR PREPARATION OF PRELIMINARY LIST — HAMILTON
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 449/00: DEADLINE FOR PREPARATION OF PRELIMINARY LIST - HAMILTON

content.content: 1. The deadline for the preparation of a preliminary list for the City of Hamilton, as incorporated under section 2 of the City of Hamilton Act, 1999, for the regular election to be held in 2000 is August 15, 2000. O. Reg. 449/00, s. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
1. The deadline for the preparation of a preliminary list for the City of Hamilton, as incorporated under section 2 of the City of Hamilton Act, 1999, for the regular election to be held in 2000 is August 15, 2000. O. Reg. 449/00, s. 1.

Français
